body.name: 12-Cup Coffee Maker with Easy On/Off Switch, Easy Pour, Non-Drip Carafe with Removable Filter Basket, White
features: Quick Brewing: Brew up to 12 cups of coffee in just 5 minutes, satisfying your caffeine cravings fast. Enjoy a freshly brewed cup every time, without waiting long. Perfect for those who need their morning kickstart pronto.

Easy-to-Use Analog Panel: With its simple analog control panel, brewing coffee has never been easier. No complicated settings or buttons to navigate through, making this coffee maker user-friendly for everyone. Say goodbye to confusing instructions and hello to hassle-free brewing.

Versatile Brewing Method: Use your favorite ground coffee with the grinding method, ensuring a rich and full-bodied taste with every sip. Experiment with different blends and flavors, enjoying your preferred cup of coffee without the limitations of pre-packaged coffee pods.

Compact & Space-saving Design: Take up minimal space on your countertop with its compact design. Measuring just 7" in depth, 9" in height, and 5" in width, it can easily fit in any kitchen setup. Enjoy your favorite coffee without sacrificing much-needed counter space.

Durable & Stylish Matte Finish: Made with high-quality plastic and featuring a sleek matte finish, this coffee maker adds a touch of style to your kitchen decor. Its durable construction ensures long-lasting use, making it a reliable companion for coffee enthusiasts.
body.description: Specifications: - Material: Made of high-quality plastic with a matte finish - Brewing Capacity: Can brew up to 12 cups in just 5 minutes - Dimensions: 7 inches (depth) x 9 inches (height) x 5 inches (width) - Method: grinding method using ground coffee - Electrical: Powered by electricity, no model number requiredUsage Instructions: 1. Fill the water tank with your desired amount of water. 2. Add your preferred amount of ground coffee to the filter. 3. Place the filter into the designated compartment and close the lid. 4. Adjust the analog control panel according to your desired strength and brewing time. 5. Press the "Brew" button and watch as the machine does its magic. 6. Once the brewing process is complete, enjoy a freshly brewed cup of coffee to kickstart your day.Additional Information: - This product is intended for household use only. - Please read the instruction manual carefully before use. - Always ensure the coffee maker is placed on a stable and flat surface. - Avoid touching hot surfaces to prevent burns. - Regular cleaning and maintenance are recommended for optimal performance.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Removable Filter Basket, Portable, Permanent Filter

productInformation.name: Specific Uses For Product
productInformation.value: Iced Coffee, Espresso, Mocha, Latte, Cappuccino
